scripts.start: node buildSearchIndex.js & DEBUG=Eleventy* eleventy --serve & npx tailwindcss -i src/styles/tailwind.css -c src/styles/tailwind.config.js -o _site/style.css --watch
scripts.build: node buildSearchIndex.js & ELEVENTY_PRODUCTION=true eleventy && NODE_ENV=production npx tailwindcss -i src/styles/tailwind.css -c src/styles/tailwind.config.js -o _site/style.css --minify
